Why is this role really critical to us?

ğŸ”¹ We are looking for a Big Data Engineer with experience in designing, building and managing applications to process large amounts of data in a Hadoop/ Spark ecosystem. Youâ€™ll provide expert guidance to source and integrate structured and unstructured data from dozens of local data sources including streaming data feeds into a data lake.
ğŸ”¹ As a Big Data Engineer, you will work closely with the team and our stakeholders to build and deliver our Hadoop based solutions for a next generation Big Data analytics platform. You will have a focus on data streaming, data management, data quality, data security and deliver the systems that process huge volumes of data. Working with our Data Scientists to help drive the company strategy and marketing campaigns out to our customers.
ğŸ”¹ At Vodafone, we donâ€™t just produce creative products, we develop amazing people too. We are driven to empower people. We are committed to helping our people perform at their best and achieve their full potential.

How will you spend your time at Vodafone?

ğŸ”¹ Youâ€™ll be designing and producing high performing and stable applications to perform complex processing of petabyte scale data in a Hadoop based environment.

ğŸ”¹ Youâ€™ll have extensive experience with performance tuning applications on Hadoop and configuring Hadoop based systems to maximise performance.

You are just the person weâ€™ve been looking for, if you have:

ğŸ”¹ BS degree or higher in a technology related field (e.g. Computer Science, Math, Information Systems, Industrial Engineering or another quantitative field)
ğŸ”¹ Minimum 2 year experience in designing, building and managing applications to process large amounts of data in a (Cloudera) Hadoop ecosystem (Spark, Hive/Impala, HBase, Yarn, Oozie)
ğŸ”¹ Strong software development experience in Python, Java or Scala programming languages (other programming languages desirable);
ğŸ”¹ Experience in designing, building and managing applications to process large amounts of data in a Hadoop ecosystem

ğŸ”¹ Experience with Linux systems, including bash programming
ğŸ”¹ Experience with other distributed NoSQL databases such as HBASE, Cassandra, Solr/Elastic Search is a plus
ğŸ”¹ Building end-to-end applications that make use of large volumes of source data from the operational systems and output insights back to business systems
ğŸ”¹ Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools (Apache Airflow, etc.) is a plus
ğŸ”¹ Building real-time data processing applications which are integrated with business systems to enable value from analytic models to drive rapid decision making
ğŸ”¹ Experience with ML and Deep Learning is a plus
ğŸ”¹ Experience with development of Cloud Native and Micro Service applications is a plus
